price: (56) In them are women limiting [their] glances,[1604] untouched[1605] before them by man or jinnī -
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
footnotes:
[1604]- To their own mates, i.e., being chaste and modest.
[1605]- Literally, they have not been caused to bleed by loss of virginity.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
